attributes.action: Raise the weekly allowance for pensioners in nursing homes from £21 a week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any pensioner going into a nursing home has all assets including ALL pensions taken into account.  ALL monies with the exception of £21 a week is taken off them to pay towards their care.  This means they have £3.00p per day for all other needs. This includes clothing, footware, and underware to name but a few things.  This is quite disgraceful. Tis allowance should be raised to at least £50 per week.
